post: The two images verses of the Hymn of the Soul in the Acts of Thomas, ca. 3rd or 4th century: Suddenly, I saw my image on my garment like in a mirror Myself and myself through myself As though divided, yet one likeness Two images: but one likeness of the king of kings.
